EmailTemplate.description: BFE Case Creation notification email template
EmailTemplate.name: BFE Case Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: BFE Request {!Case.Subject} {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact_Name__c}
Thank you for placing your Buyer Furnished Equipment (BFE) request with Honeywell Aerospace. We have received your request and have routed it to one of our customer service specialists for review and action. The case tracking number for this inquiry is {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}.
You can view order status on the My Aerospace portal.
You will be contacted by a customer service specialist if additional information is needed regarding your current request. If you placed an order request and did not include your Purchase Order with your original request, please respond directly to this email and attach your Purchase Order to your response.
Thank you. We appreciate your business!
Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c} Due to government regulations and/or contractual limitations, all data and/or attachments containing export control information and/or containing details related to Space, Munitions and Missiles items is not authorized for entry or use in our applications or systems at the present time
